attributes.action: agree EU uni - lateral and all - party goals with collectivist mechanisms to achieve them - labouring to work conservatively !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Because of her imperial heritage, Britain has always been at the centre of Europe and home is where the heart is ! But working together for the joint post - war European future will need agreed goals, building a stable society which equals facilitating mechanisms by individual nations yet collectively through international institutions. So the petitioner is urging the P.M. to adopt a policy of "labouring to embrace new ideas conservatively !".
